activities: CP International, LLC and its US affiliates receive personal information from the EU as a result of its operation of a wellness program and fitness center in Germany. In general, the personal information we collect enables us to provide services to users and helps us to develop customized training programs for them, to improve our products and services, and to document our performance under our agreements.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client data, collected online and offline, including manually processed data
